narrative.title: 2E Division D Infanterie Marocaine - 1943Q2
narrative.situation: French Infantry Division (Moroccan) deployed in North Africa during 1943Q2.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.seasonal_impacts: Spring/early summer (May-June): Warm, dry conditions ideal for training. Minimal precipitation. Moderate temperatures suitable for extended field exercises.
weather.environmental_challenges: Heat management during midday training, dust conditions in plains areas, limited water sources in mountain training areas, adaptation of North African troops to French-style military organization.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter
